updates.title: Workspace Studio aims to solve the real agent problem: Getting employees to use them
updates.description: One problem enterprises face is getting employees to actually use the AI agents their dev teams have built. Google, which has already shipped many AI tools through its Workspace apps, has made Google Workspace Studio generally available to give more employees access to design, manage and share AI agents, further democratizing agentic workflows. This puts Google directly in competition with Microsoft’s Copilot and undercuts some integrations that brought OpenAI’s ChatGPT into enterprise applicati

updates.title: 8 tips for designers building branded templates in Figma Buzz
updates.description: To create self-serve templates that bend—but don’t break—brand designers need to consider work through a marketing lens. Here’s how to set up editing guardrails and design layouts that flex and scale.

updates.title: AWS launches Kiro powers with Stripe, Figma, and Datadog integrations for AI-assisted coding
updates.description: Amazon Web Services on Wednesday introduced Kiro powers, a system that allows software developers to give their AI coding assistants instant, specialized expertise in specific tools and workflows — addressing what the company calls a fundamental bottleneck in how artificial intelligence agents operate today.AWS made the announcement at its annual re:Invent conference in Las Vegas. The capability marks a departure from how most AI coding tools work today. Typically, these tools load every possibl

updates.title: Delivering securely on data and AI strategy
updates.description: Most organizations feel the imperative to keep pace with continuing advances in AI capabilities, as highlighted in a recent MIT Technology Review Insights report. That clearly has security implications, particularly as organizations navigate a surge in the volume, velocity, and variety of security data. This explosion of data, coupled with fragmented toolchains, is making it…

updates.title: Three new features to help build brand momentum with Figma Buzz
updates.description: With marketing templates that are now connected to your design system, plugins that pull in your favorite apps, and video trimming in Figma Buzz, we’re giving designers and marketers new tools to create branded assets that speak volumes.

updates.title: How to streamline your design system workflow in Figma
updates.description: If you’ve ever stared down a blank Figma file while building a new design system, never fear: These new features and plugins will turn that mountain of work into an afternoon task.

updates.title: Meta centralizes Facebook and Instagram support, tests AI support assistant
updates.description: The new support hub will connect users to security tools, account recovery options, and an AI assistant.

updates.title: Just our type: The story of creating Figma Sans
updates.description: As Figma expands to include tools for all product builders, our community has evolved—and so has our brand. We’ve overhauled our entire visual identity from color palette to illustration style, and even commissioned a new typeface.
